game.name: illumine
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 지금까지의 로그 라이크와는 다른 경험을 느껴보세요. 당신의 행동에 의해 즉시 만들어지는 세계를 탐험해 보세요. 당신의 목적에 대해 생각해 보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Experience a different take on the roguelike genre. Explore a world created on the fly by your actions. Wonder about your purpose.

reviewHighlights.text: illumine, developed and published by Dejima, is an experimental roguelike adventure that places transformation, interpretation, and player agency at t...
